people_also_ask.question: How does Final Fantasy Tactics Work?
people_also_ask.heading: Final Fantasy Tactics is a tactical role-playing game in which players follow the story of protagonist Ramza Beoulve. The game features two modes of play: battles and the world map. ... During battle, whenever a unit performs an action successfully, it gains experience points (EXP) and Job Points (JP).
people_also_ask.title: Final Fantasy Tactics - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Is Final Fantasy Tactics difficult?
people_also_ask.heading: It would be impossible to progress without some seriously extensive background knowledge of the games rules and abilities. ... You should also realize that there are some WAY harder tactical games out there and even though it's a bit complex for beginners, FFT is considered one of the easier titles available.17-Nov-2012
people_also_ask.title: This game's difficulty is too much - Final Fantasy Tactics

people_also_ask.question: How many Final Fantasy Tactics are there?
people_also_ask.heading: four titles
people_also_ask.heading2: It consists of four titles, Final Fantasy Tactics, its remake Final Fantasy Tactics: The War of the Lions, Final Fantasy Tactics Advance, and the sequel to Advance, Final Fantasy Tactics A2: Grimoire of the Rift. The games are set in the Ivalice setting of the Final Fantasy series.
